    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120033</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vijolični tovornjak lovi rumeni tovornjak</string>
            <string language="en">Violet truck is chasing yellow one</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Violetter LKW jagt Gelb Eins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le camion violet chasse le jaune un</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O caminhão violeta está perseguindo o amarelo 
um</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il camion viola sta inseguendo il colore giallo 
uno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ιώδες truck χαράζει κίτρινο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El carro violeta está persiguiendo el amarillo 
uno</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Glede na gibanje obeh tovornjak ugotovi, kdaj in kje bo eden ujel drugega.</string>
            <string language="en">Observe the two trucks and determine where and when will the faster one catch the other one.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">primerjava hitrosti</string>
            <string language="en">speed comparison</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinematika</string>
            <string language="en">kinematics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beobachten Sie die zwei LKWAS und stellen Sie wo 
fest und wann werden Sie, die schnellere Verriegelung die andere.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Observez les deux camions et déterminez où et 
quand  plus l'un crochet l'autre est rapide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Observe os dois caminhões e determine onde e 
quando  o um prendedor mais rápido outro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Osservi i due camion e determini dove e quando 
l'un fermo più veloce altro quello.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρατηρήστε τα δύο truck και καθορίστε όπου και 
πότε γρηγορότερο θα πιάσει άλλο ένα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Observe los dos carros y determínese dónde y 
cuando  el un retén más rápido es el otro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit Vergleich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kinematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
